Casa Carmen

L'Olivé is a classic in the city of Barcelona. With large rooms and a good decor, combining traditional and modern touches, the restaurant offers the perfect environment for any occasion.

L'Olivé cuisine is a perfect sample of the Catalan and Mediterranean gastronomic tradition, with mountain and sea specialities, always prepared with an original, modern touch and the best quality. Desserts are home-made and the wine list features imporant references.

Location: Eixample

Dining room capacities: 54 pax

Price Level: High

Style: Mediterranean cuisine

Special diets: Available

Handicapped facilities: No
